goal: KIRI is an insurance industry think tank dedicated to promoting the sound development of Korean insurance industry and the advancement of Korean economy.
interests: Banking and financial services, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Fraud prevention, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: To follow up current status of EU initiatives related with insurance industry (mainly focusing on consumer protection and financial stability)
